content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]
[[div class="logo"]]
[[/div]]


[[module css]]
:root {
  --header-title: "Strange Matter";
  --header-subtitle: "Art Hub";
  --top-layer-height-offset: -1rem;
}

[[/module]]

[[module css]]
:root {

  --accentColor: 162, 237, 255;
}

[[/module]]



[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[div style="margin-right: 2em; margin-top: -10px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]
[[/>]]




Hi there. I'm [[*user Strange Matter]] and welcome to my art hub! I post some fan art every now and then. Check out my **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/strange-matter-writes Authors Page]** for my written works!

[[tab Pieces]]
